name: i wanna be with you
description:
i wanna be with you

This is an idea that I thought up while I was half asleep, and decided to run with it.

It is a sweet & short little game where you talk with and befriend a stranger in a desert.

Hopefully it encourages the player to appreciate the little conversations we have with other people, and reflect how much we can mean to someone.

Thanks to  Adam for the bitsy engine, ayolland for the borksy tool, and mildmojo and Sean for various hacks.

The non-capitalization is on purpose, btw.
